page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT LOCAL EMPLOYERS
page.content: The Irchester firm of J.Manger & Son Ltd. makes and sells DIY products.They have 38 people working for them,18 men and 20 women.Most of the employees live in the village.The firm sells a range of 38 products.The goods are distribu- ted by road.Reliance Systems in the High Street makes telecommunications systems and switchboards.Their main factory is in Wellingborough.In Irches- ter they employ 11 people,all who live in the village.Texas Instruments,Bed- ford are a large employer of Rushden people and Sharnbrook Unilever told us that of a workforce of 1200,600 came from Rushden.Of a small sample of work- ers we found that half had been in their jobs for 5 years or more.About a quarter had found their job through a friend.A minister of religion said he had found his job when God asked him to preach for the church.
